summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alleys in Block 7, Greenwood Park Addition, being the alleys in the block bounded by North 81st Street, North 82nd Street, Greenwood Avenue and 1st Avenue Northwest; and certain other alleys and places, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 17503 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment of Bonds".
